div.head: 月事衰少不來
div.div: the monthly affair is weak and diminished and fails to arrive; minimal or failing menstruation

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Yue shi shuai shao bu lai

entry.def: the monthly affair is weak and diminished and fails to arrive; minimal or failing menstruation

sense.def: Illness Sign of an obviously decreased or even entirely absent menstruation. Su wen 素問 40: 病名 血枯，此得之年少時，有所大脫血，若醉入房中，氣竭肝傷，故月事衰 少不來也 , “The disease is named blood decay. It is acquired in younger years either [because of] a massive loss of blood or [because] one has entered the [woman’s] chambers in a state of drunkenness [with the result that] the qi is exhausted and the liver is harmed. Hence, the monthly affair is weak and diminished and fails to arrive ”.
